column4: Hi.  I'm typing my password to login to Oneric.  It's prompting, however, for my keyring password.  I'm not using auto login.  The passwords match (I reset them to match again to be sure).  Still, I'm getting the prompt.  Any ideas why?
it should be the same, unless youve changed the ROOT
changed the root password?  My user, root, and keyring password are all the same.
thats the only think i can think of
